mapper.select: SELECT SNS_STORY_NO, SNS_NICKNAME, SNS_STORY_DATE, SNS_STATUS, SNS_ACCOUNT_NO FROM SNS_STORY WHERE SNS_NICKNAME = #{snsNickname} ORDER BY SNS_STORY_NO DESC

SELECT A.SNS_NICKNAME, (SELECT MEDIA_SERVER_FILE FROM MULTIMEDIA WHERE IDENTIFY_ID = (SELECT SNS_ACCOUNT_NO FROM SNS_ACCOUNT WHERE SNS_ACCOUNT_NO= A.SNS_ACCOUNT_NO)) AS MEDIA_SERVER_FILE FROM (SELECT SNS_NICKNAME, SNS_story_DATE, SNS_ACCOUNT_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY sns_nickname ORDER BY to_number(SUBSTR(sns_story_no,5)) DESC) AS rn FROM sns_story) A, (SELECT SNS_FOLLOW_ID FROM SNS_FOLLOW WHERE SNS_FOLLOWER_ID = #{snsFollowerId}) B WHERE A.SNS_ACCOUNT_NO = B.SNS_Follow_id AND rn = 1
